TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ToolZone extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone implements class System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler
Public MustInherit Class ToolZone Inherits WebZone Implements IPostBackEventHandler
public ref class ToolZone abstract : System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::WebZone, System::Web::UI::IPostBackEventHandler
type ToolZone = class inherit WebZone interface IPostBackEventHandler

summary.span: 用作一组仅在某些相关页面显示模式中出现的帮助器区域的基类。

span.span: Serves as the base class for a set of helper zones that appear only in certain associated page display modes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Web 部件控件集中，区域是包含服务器控件的网页上的一个区域，并为包含的控件提供具有一致的用户界面 (UI) 的模块化布局。In the Web Parts control set, a zone is a region on a Web page that contains server controls, and provides modular layout with a consistent user interface (UI) for the contained controls. 派生自基类的两种常规类型的区域控件 ： 区域和 区域。There are two general types of zone controls that derive from the base class: zones and zones. 区域包含服务器控件 (这些控件可以是自定义 控件，也可以是其他服务器控件，包括) 的 ASP.NET 控件和用户控件。The zones contain server controls (which can be custom controls, or other server controls including ASP.NET controls and user controls). 这些控件构成网页的主 UI，并在所有可能的显示模式中可见，除非以编程方式或用户的方式隐藏它们。These controls form the primary UI of a Web page and are visible in all the possible display modes, unless they are hidden programmatically or by a user. 区域是仅当页面处于与区域关联的特定显示模式时才显示的特定帮助器区域，这些区域还包含特殊的服务器控件，使用户能够在浏览器中修改网页的布局、外观、属性和内容。The zones are special helper zones that appear only when a page is in certain display modes associated with the zone, and these zones also contain special server controls that enable users to modify the layout, appearance, properties, and content of Web pages from within a browser. 开发人员可以从基类 或任意派生 区域继承来创建自定义区域。Developers can inherit from the base class, or any of the derived zones, to create custom zones. Web 部件控件集包含三种类型的 区域，下表对此进行了说明。The Web Parts control set contains three types of zones, described in the following table. |工具区域类型Tool zone type|说明Description| |--------------------|-----------------| ||包含用于 在页上编辑和服务器控件属性的控件。Contains controls used to edit and server control properties on a page.| ||包含 控件，这些控件又包含 用户可以添加到页中的控件。Contains controls, which in turn contain controls that users can add to a page.| ||不包含声明性标记元素;此区域是自包含的。Does not contain declarative markup elements; this zone is self-contained. 在运行时，它将呈现一个特殊的 UI，使用户能够管理控件之间的连接 。At run time, it renders a special UI that enables users to manage connections between controls.| 基类提供对派生区域有用的方法和属性。The base class provides methods and properties that are useful to derived zones. 它包含 和 方法，这些方法可重写类中的基方法 ，并呈现区域的标头和表尾的按钮和其他 UI 属性。It contains and methods, which override the base methods from the class, and render buttons and other UI attributes for the header and footer of a zone. 还有多个用于处理谓词的成员，用户可以在不同的区域中执行这些操作。There are also several members for handling verbs, which are common UI actions that users can perform in the various zones. 与处理谓词相关的成员包括： 、 和 。Members related to handling verbs include: , , and . 包含两个重载方法，这些方法将 对象添加到集合中 。The contains two overloaded methods, which add objects to the collection. 此关联显示模式的集合确定哪些显示模式与特定类型的区域相关 (换言之，它确定区域在哪些显示模式下可见) 。This collection of associated display modes determines which display modes are related to a particular type of zone (in other words, it determines in which display modes a zone is visible). 给定网页上所有区域的所有关联显示模式的联合 确定了) 在正常浏览模式下 (的显示模式。The union of all associated display modes for all the zones on a given Web page determines which display modes (besides the normal browse mode) are possible or supported on the page. 页面支持的显示模式集合包含在 属性中。The collection of supported display modes for a page is contained in the property. > [!NOTE] > 在任意给定时间，页面上只能有一个显示模式处于活动状态。At any given time, only one display mode can be active on a page. 当前处于活动状态的显示模式在属性中被引用 。The currently active display mode is referenced in the property. 类还包含多个样式属性，这些属性包含区域的各种 UI 元素的样式属性。The class also contains a number of style properties that contain style attributes for the various UI elements of a zone. 某些 样式属性包括 、 、 和 。Some style properties include , , , and .

para.span: Web 部件控制集包含上面的 "备注" 部分中列出的专用区域，您通常可以从其中一个区域派生，以便将自定义行为添加到区域。

span.span: The Web Parts control set contains the specialized zones listed above in the Remarks section, and you can often derive from one of them to add custom behavior to a zone.

para.span: 但是，若要对区域的呈现进行更多的编程控制，应直接从 类继承。

span.span: However, for more programmatic control over the rendering of a zone, you should inherit directly from the class.

para.span: 例如，你可能想要为特定的任务（如搜索区域）创建自定义区域。

span.span: For example, you might want to create a custom zone for a specialized task, such as a search zone.

para.span: 若要创建自定义区域，可以重写任何虚拟 成员以完全自定义呈现，也可以仅重写特定成员。

span.span: To create a custom zone, you can override any of the virtual members to fully customize the rendering, or you can override only a specific member.

para.span: 另外，还可以通过从类继承来为区域创建自定义显示模式 ，但这不是必需的。

span.span: Optionally, you can also create a custom display mode for your zone by inheriting from the class, but this is not required.

para.span: 在区域的构造函数中，应添加要在其中向对象显示区域的各种显示模式 ，以便在页处于这些显示模式时区域可见。

span.span: In the constructor of your zone, you should add the various display modes in which you want your zone to be displayed to a object, so that your zone is visible when the page is in those display modes.
ASP.NET Web Parts Overview
Web Parts Control Set Overview

related.span: 演练：在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式

span.span: Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

summary.span: 将一个或多个 对象与 区域的特定类型关联，从而使该区域在页处于合适的页显示模式下时能够显示出来。

span.span: Associates one or more objects with a particular type of zone, enabling that zone to be displayed when a page is in the appropriate page display mode.
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Collections.ICollection associatedDisplayModes) cil managed

param.name: associatedDisplayModes
param.span: 确定何时能够显示区域的 对象的 。

span.span: An of objects that determine when a zone can be displayed.

summary.span: 将 对象的集合与特定的 区域关联，以使该区域在合适的页显示模式下能够显示出来。

span.span: Associates a collection of objects with a particular zone, so that the zone can be displayed in the appropriate page display modes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数用于将 区域与一个或多个显示模式相关联。The constructor is used to associate a zone with one or more display modes. 这样，便可以在关联的显示模式下显示工具区域。This enables the tool zone to be displayed in the associated display modes. > [!NOTE] > 在 Web 部件控件集提供的区域实现中，每个区域仅与一个显示模式相关联。In the implementation of zones provided by the Web Parts control set, each zone is associated with only one display mode. 但是，如果使用构造函数的此重载，则可以将自定义区域与多个显示模式相关联。However, using this overload of the constructor, it is possible to associate a custom zone with multiple display modes.

span.span: The parameter is equal to or 0.
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode associatedDisplayMode) cil managed

span.span: A that determines when a zone can be displayed.

summary.span: 将单个 对象与特定的 区域关联，以使该区域在合适的页显示模式下能够显示出来。

span.span: Associates a single object with a particular zone, so that the zone can be displayed in the appropriate page display mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数用于将 区域与单个显示模式相关联。The constructor is used to associate a zone with a single display mode. 这使得在页面进入该显示模式时可以显示工具区域。This enables the tool zone to be displayed when a page enters that display mode. 例如， 只能在 模式下显示控件。For example, a control can be displayed only in mode.

span.span: The parameter is equal to .

summary.span: 获取与特定 区域关联的 对象的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of objects that are associated with a particular zone.

value.span: 包含与 控件关联的 对象的 。

span.span: A that contains objects associated with a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个 控件都具有与之关联的特殊页面显示模式，如下表所示。Each control has a special page display mode associated with it, as indicated in the following table. > [!NOTE] > 在 Web 部件控件集提供的区域实现中，每个区域仅与一个显示模式相关联。In the implementation of zones provided by the Web Parts control set, each zone is associated with only one display mode. 但是，使用 可以将自定义区域与多个显示模式相关联。However, using the you could associate a custom zone with multiple display modes. |工具区域类型Tool zone type|关联显示模式Associated display mode| |--------------------|-----------------------------| ||| ||| ||| 将页上每个区域的关联显示模式集合添加到 属性中，该属性确定页上可能的显示模式的总集。The collection of associated display modes for each zone on a page is added to the property, which determines the total set of possible display modes on a page.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

summary.span: 提供一个可由派生的 控件进行重写的基方法声明，以处理关闭专用区域的详细信息。

span.span: Provides a base method declaration that derived controls can override to handle the details of closing a specialized zone.
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overridable ReadOnly Property Display As Boolean
protected: virtual property bool Display { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示 控件当前是否正在显示。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether a control is currently displayed.

value.span: 如果 当前正在显示，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the is currently displayed; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，在加载 Web 部件页面时，控件不会显示。 controls, by default, are not displayed when a Web Parts page loads. 它们仅在以编程方式切换页面或用户进入与特定控件关联的页面显示模式时才显示 。They appear only when the page is switched programmatically or by a user into a page display mode that is associated with a particular control.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property EditUIStyle As Style
public: property System::Web::UI::WebControls::Style ^ EditUIStyle { System::Web::UI::WebControls::Style ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取 控件中包含的可编辑控件的样式特性。

span.span: Gets the style attributes for the editable controls contained in a control.

value.span: ，其中包含 控件中可编辑控件的样式特性。

span.span: A that contains style attributes for editable controls within a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可以访问控件内包含的可编辑控件的样式特征 。The property enables you to access style characteristics for the editable controls contained within a control. 可编辑控件由派生区域呈现 ，其中包括、和控件，这些控件 允许用户编辑控件上的属性值 。Editable controls are rendered by the derived zones, and include controls such as , , and controls that enable users to edit property values on controls. 属性中包含的样式特征 适用于可编辑控件，这些控件共同构成了向用户显示的 (UI) 的编辑用户界面。The style characteristics contained in the property apply to the editable controls, which together compose the editing user interface (UI) that appears to users. > [!NOTE] > 即使属性是只读的，你也可以设置基础对象的样式属性 。Even though the property is read-only, you can set the style attributes of the underlying object. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将 属性与继承的控件一起使用 。The following code example shows how to use the property with an inherited control. 具体而言，它演示了如何更改 控件中的 UI 元素的属性 。Specifically, it demonstrates how to change the property for UI elements in an control. 此代码示例的第一部分是在页中引用的用户控件，并使你能够将页面切换到不同的显示模式。The first part of the code example is a user control that is referenced in the page, and enables you to switch the page to different display modes. 有关显示模式以及允许用户在其中进行切换的详细信息，请参阅 [演练：在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For more information on display modes and enabling users to switch among them, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ToolZone_EditUIStyle#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ToolZone_EditUIStyle/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#5)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ToolZone_EditUIStyle#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ToolZone_EditUIStyle/VB/displaymodemenuvb.ascx#5)] 此代码示例的第二部分是网页。The second part of the code example is the Web page. 页面包含 从类继承的控件 。The page contains an control, which inherits from the class. `Button1_Click`页中的方法设置 属性。The `Button1_Click` method in the page sets the property. 请注意，在加载页面后，必须将页面切换到编辑模式，才能在 控件的 UI 上查看属性的效果 。Note that after the page loads, you must switch the page into edit mode to see the effects of the property on the control's UI. 当你单击显示 " **更改编辑 UI 字体**" 的按钮时，请注意区域中的可编辑控件的字体发生了更改。As you click the button that says **Change Edit UI Font**, notice that the font of the editable controls in the zone changes. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ToolZone_EditUIStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ToolZone_EditUIStyle/CS/toolzone_edituistylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ToolZone_EditUIStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ToolZone_EditUIStyle/VB/toolzone_edituistylevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property HeaderCloseVerb As WebPartVerb

summary.span: 获取对位于 控件的页眉中，用于关闭该控件的 对象的引用。

span.span: Gets a reference to the object in the header of a control that is used to close the control.
The used to close a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以 通过编程方式或在网页的声明性标记中使用属性来指定用于关闭控件的谓词的各种属性 。You can use the property programmatically or in the declarative markup of a Web page to specify various attributes for the verb that is used to close a control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将 属性与继承的控件一起使用 。The following code example shows how to use the property with an inherited control. 该示例演示如何启用和禁用控件标头中的关闭谓词 。The example shows how to enable and disable the close verb in the header of an control. 此代码示例的第一部分是在页中引用的用户控件，并使你能够将页面切换到不同的显示模式。The first part of the code example is a user control that is referenced in the page, and enables you to switch the page to different display modes. 有关显示模式以及允许用户在其中进行切换的详细信息，请参阅 [演练：在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For more information on display modes and enabling users to switch among them, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ToolZone_HeaderCloseVerb#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ToolZone_HeaderCloseVerb/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#5)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ToolZone_HeaderCloseVerb#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ToolZone_HeaderCloseVerb/VB/displaymodemenuvb.ascx#5)] 此代码示例的第二部分是网页。The second part of the code example is the Web page. 页面包含 从类继承的控件 。The page contains an control, which inherits from the class. `Button1_Click`页中的方法设置 属性值。The `Button1_Click` method in the page sets the property value. 请注意，在加载页面后，您必须将页面切换到编辑模式，才能查看使用控件上属性的代码的效果 。Note that after the page loads, you must switch the page into edit mode to see the effects of the code that uses the property on the control. 单击 " **启用/禁用关闭谓词** " 按钮时，应以其他方式启用和禁用区域的标题中的谓词。As you click the **Enable/Disable Close Verb** button, the verb in the header of the zone should be alternately enabled and disabled. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ToolZone_HeaderCloseVerb#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ToolZone_HeaderCloseVerb/CS/toolzone_headercloseverbcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ToolZone_HeaderCloseVerb#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ToolZone_HeaderCloseVerb/VB/toolzone_headercloseverbvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property HeaderVerbStyle As Style
public: property System::Web::UI::WebControls::Style ^ HeaderVerbStyle { System::Web::UI::WebControls::Style ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取在 控件中显示的所有页眉谓词的样式特性。

span.span: Gets the style attributes for all header verbs displayed in a control.

value.span: ，其中包含 中的页眉谓词的样式特性。

span.span: A that contains style attributes for header verbs within a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 虽然属性是只读的，但它使你能够获取或设置 控件中所有标头谓词的基础对象的样式特性 。The property, though it is read-only, enables you to get or set the style attributes of the underlying object for all the header verbs in a control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将 属性与继承的控件一起使用 。The following code example shows how to use the property with an inherited control. 该示例演示如何使用此属性更改控件周围边框的宽度 。The example shows how to change the width of the border around an control by using this property. 此代码示例的第一部分是在页中引用的用户控件，并使你能够将页面切换到不同的显示模式。The first part of the code example is a user control that is referenced in the page, and enables you to switch the page to different display modes. 有关显示模式以及允许用户在其中进行切换的详细信息，请参阅 [演练：在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For more information on display modes and enabling users to switch among them, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ToolZone_HeaderVerbStyle#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ToolZone_HeaderVerbStyle/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#5)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ToolZone_HeaderVerbStyle#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ToolZone_HeaderVerbStyle/VB/displaymodemenuvb.ascx#5)] 此代码示例的第二部分是网页。The second part of the code example is the Web page. 页面包含 从类继承的控件 。The page contains an control, which inherits from the class. `Button1_Click`页中的方法设置 属性值。The `Button1_Click` method in the page sets the property value. 请注意，在加载页面后，您必须将页面切换到编辑模式，才能查看使用控件上属性的代码的效果 。Note that after the page loads, you must switch the page into edit mode to see the effects of the code that uses the property on the control. 单击 " **切换标题谓词" 边框** 按钮时，区域周围的边框宽度应该会改变。As you click the **Toggle Header Verb Border** button, the border width around the zone should change. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ToolZone_HeaderVerbStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ToolZone_HeaderVerbStyle/CS/toolzone_headerverbstylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ToolZone_HeaderVerbStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ToolZone_HeaderVerbStyle/VB/toolzone_headerverbstylevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件中为最终用户提供说明的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text in a control that provides directions for end users.

value.span: 一个字符串，其中包含为最终用户提供的说明。

span.span: A string that contains the directions for end users.

value.span: 适合特定工具区域的默认值由派生的 类提供。

span.span: A default value appropriate to specific tool zones is provided by derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用于保存在显示特定控件时为最终用户提供的一组指令 。The property is used to hold a set of instructions that are provided for end users when a particular control is displayed. 设置此属性后，可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [全球化和本地化](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将 属性与继承的控件一起使用 。The following code example shows how to use the property with an inherited control. 该示例演示如何使用此属性更改控件中显示的指令文本值 。The example shows how to change the value of the instruction text that appears in an control by using this property. 此代码示例的第一部分是在页中引用的用户控件，并使你能够将页面切换到不同的显示模式。The first part of the code example is a user control that is referenced in the page, and enables you to switch the page to different display modes. 有关显示模式以及允许用户在其中进行切换的详细信息，请参阅 [演练：在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For more information on display modes and enabling users to switch among them, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ToolZone_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ToolZone_Overview/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#5)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ToolZone_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ToolZone_Overview/VB/displaymodemenuvb.ascx#5)] 此代码示例的第二部分演示了一个分部类，其中包含在方法中以编程方式更新属性的代码 `Button1_Click` 。The second part of the code example shows a partial class that contains the code to update the property programmatically in the `Button1_Click` method. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-csharp[WebParts_ToolZone_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ToolZone_Overview/CS/Toolzone_overview.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_ToolZone_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ToolZone_Overview/VB/Toolzone_overview.vb#2)] 此代码示例的第三部分显示了包含两个继承控件的网页 ： 控件和 控件。The third part of the code example shows a Web page that contains two inherited controls: a control and an control. 每个 控件设置页的声明性标记中的某些属性。Each control sets some properties in the declarative markup of the page. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ToolZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ToolZone_Overview/CS/Toolzone_overview_cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ToolZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ToolZone_Overview/VB/Toolzone_overview_vb.aspx#1)] 您可以在浏览器中加载页面，并在各种页面显示模式间切换，以查看不同的工具区域的行为。You can load the page in a browser and switch among the various page display modes to see how the different tool zones behave. 将页面切换到编辑模式，在文本框中输入一些文本，然后单击 " **更新" "编辑区域文本** " 以查看以编程方式更新属性的效果 。Switch the page into edit mode, enter some text into the text box, and click **Update Edit Zone Text** to see the effect of programmatically updating the property. 说明文本显示在区域的顶部附近。The instruction text appears near the top of the zone.

para.span: 派生自类的 Web 部件控件集中的工具区域 (参阅类概述中列出的区域 ) 重写 属性以为最终用户提供默认说明。

span.span: Tool zones in the Web Parts control set that derive from the class (see the zones listed in the class overview) override the property to provide default instructions for end users.
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

summary.span: 在 控件回发到服务器时调用该控件的 方法。

span.span: Calls the method for a control when the control posts back to the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果用户在控件中单击 "关闭" 谓词，则当该页将参数值传递 `eventArgument` 给方法时 ，该控件将调用 方法。If a user clicks a close verb in a control, when the page passes the value of the `eventArgument` parameter to the method, the control then calls the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将呈现控件标题的所有详细信息 ，包括样式特性、包含标题的表、实际内容和关闭谓词。The method renders all the details for the header of a control, including style attributes, the table that contains the header, the actual contents, and a close verb.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法呈现区域中特定对象的用户界面 。The method renders the user interface for a specific object in a zone. 方法将检查属性的值， 并根据该值，将谓词呈现为按钮、链接或可单击图像。The method checks the value of the property and, based on that value, renders the verb as a button, a link, or a clickable image.

Public Overrides Property Visible As Boolean

member this.Visible : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示服务器控件是否作为用户界面 (UI) 元素呈现在页上。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a server control is rendered as a user interface (UI) element on the page.

value.span: 如果控件在页上可见，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control is visible on the page; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类将重写基 属性，以同时考虑基属性的值和属性的值 。The class overrides the base property to consider both the value of the base property and the value of the property. 如果两个属性值均设置为 `true` ，则 属性将返回值 `true` ，并且控件在页面上可见。If both property values are set to `true`, then the property returns a value of `true`, and the control is visible on the page. 如果任一属性值为 `false` ，则 属性将返回值 `false` ，并且该控件不可见。If either property value is `false`, the property returns a value of `false`, and the control is not visible. > [!IMPORTANT] > 属性只能在设计时在设计器（如 Microsoft Visual Studio 设计器）中分配。The property can only be assigned at design time in a designer, such as the Microsoft Visual Studio designer. 如果尝试以编程方式设置属性，则会引发异常。If you attempt to set the property programmatically, an exception is thrown. 此属性在可视化设计器中不可绑定，但在运行时是可绑定的。This property is not bindable in visual designers, but is bindable at runtime. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see .

exception.span: 调用方尝试在运行时设置该属性。

span.span: The caller attempts to set the property at run time.
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls
